Module project
Package payrollGUI

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
payrollGUI.Controller
public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
The Controller class is used to control the GUI. Allows access to simulate a company through a GUI.
Author:
Muhammad Faizan Saiyed, Michael Neustater
